code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[surname,setSurname]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("https://ybg-back.vercel.app/register",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({name,surname})});const data=await response.json();alert(data.message);}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Surname",value:surname,onChange:e=>setSurname(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default Register;
